description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府用以过滤国际互联网出口内容的软硬件系统集合。
description.en: A combination of hardware and software systems used by the government of the People's Republic of China to filter the content of its international internet gateways.

en: Government of the People's Republic of China

description.en: An academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, considered to be the principal designer of the Great Firewall.

description.zh-cn: 人权活动家。
description.en: Human rights activist.

description.zh-cn: 中国异议人士，“拆墙运动”发起者。
description.en: Chinese dissident, founder of the 'Tear Down the Wall Movement'.

description.zh-cn: Google提供的电子邮件服务。
description.en: Email service provided by Google.

description.zh-cn: 一种用于匿名通信的自由及开放源代码软件。
description.en: Free and open-source software for enabling anonymous communication.

nodes.id: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
中国国家互联网信息办公室

description.zh-cn: 监测中国互联网审查的组织。
description.en: An organization that monitors internet censorship in China.

description.zh-cn: 防火长城是中华人民共和国政府用以过滤国际互联网出口内容的软硬件系统集合。
description.en: The Great Firewall is a combination of hardware and software systems used by the government of the People's Republic of China to filter its international internet gateways.

relationships.source: 国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心

description.zh-cn: 自本世纪初以来，由国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心（CNCERT）运营和维护防火长城。
description.en: Since the beginning of the 21st century, the GFW has been operated and maintained by the National Computer Network Emergency Response Technical Team/Coordination Center of China (CNCERT/CC).

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国计算机信息网络国际联网管理暂行规定

description.zh-cn: 作为时任总理签署国务院令发布施行该规定。
description.en: As the then-Premier, signed the State Council decree to issue and implement this regulation.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国计算机信息网络国际联网管理暂行规定

description.zh-cn: 该规定第六条（不得自行建立或者使用其他信道进行国际联网）被广泛用于处罚“翻墙”行为。
description.en: Article 6 of this regulation (prohibiting the establishment or use of other channels for international networking) has been widely used to penalize circumvention activities ('wall-climbing').

description.zh-cn: 被认为是防火长城关键部分的首要设计师，被称为“中国国家防火墙之父”。
description.en: Considered to be the principal designer of key parts of the Great Firewall, known as the 'Father of the GFW'.

description.zh-cn: 向中华人民共和国政府提供了具有流量监控和过滤功能的互联网设备，用于构建防火长城。
description.en: Provided the Chinese government with internet equipment featuring traffic monitoring and filtering capabilities, which were used to build the Great Firewall.

description.zh-cn: 因其向中国提供审查技术而召开听证会进行质询。
description.en: Held a hearing to question the company for providing censorship technology to China.

description.zh-cn: 因其向中国提供审查技术而召开听证会进行质询。
description.en: Held a hearing to question the company for providing censorship technology to China.

description.zh-cn: 因其向中国提供审查技术而召开听证会进行质询。
description.en: Held a hearing to question the company for providing censorship technology to China.

description.zh-cn: 因其向中国提供审查技术而召开听证会进行质询。
description.en: Held a hearing to question the company for providing censorship technology to China.

description.zh-cn: 在美国国会听证会上指责思科主动向中国安全部门提供最新技术。
description.en: Accused Cisco at a U.S. congressional hearing of proactively providing the latest technology to Chinese security departments.

description.zh-cn: 曾经加入中国GFW防火长城计划，并派高管加入研究搜索引擎安全管理系统。
description.en: Once joined the GFW project and dispatched executives to participate in researching a search engine security management system.

description.zh-cn: 据透露，方滨兴卸任后，防火长城项目交由启明星辰公司负责。
description.en: It was revealed that after Fang Binxing stepped down, the Great Firewall project was handed over to Venustech.

description.zh-cn: 根据泄露文件，该公司参与了防火长城的研发。
description.en: According to leaked documents, the company participated in the R&D of the Great Firewall.

description.zh-cn: 共同建立Geedge Networks。
description.en: Co-founded Geedge Networks.

relationships.target: 中国科学院信息工程研究所

description.zh-cn: 与该所的MESA实验室存在密切联系。
description.en: Has close ties with the MESA lab of the institute.

description.zh-cn: 发表社评认为防火墙帮助中国更加强大，必将得到历史的正面评价。
description.en: Published an editorial arguing that the firewall helps make China stronger and will receive a positive evaluation from history.

description.zh-cn: 刊文建议当局继续改进和完善“防火墙”。
description.en: Published an article suggesting authorities continue to improve and perfect the 'firewall'.

description.zh-cn: 在其年度报告中称防火长城是严重的贸易障碍。
description.en: Described the Great Firewall as a significant trade barrier in its annual report.

description.zh-cn: 作为外交部发言人，回应美国贸易代表办公室的指责，维护了中国的互联网管理模式。
description.en: As a Foreign Ministry spokesperson, responded to accusations from the USTR, defending China's model of internet governance.

description.zh-cn: 作为外交部发言人，回应互联网封锁问题，称对互联网依法管理符合国际惯例。
description.en: As a Foreign Ministry spokesperson, responded to questions about internet blocking by stating that lawful management of the internet is in line with international practice.

description.zh-cn: 发起“拆墙运动”，将防火长城称为“网络柏林墙”。
description.en: Initiated the 'Tear Down the Wall Movement', referring to the Great Firewall as the 'online Berlin Wall'.

description.zh-cn: 该运动旨在拆除防火长城。
description.en: The movement aims to dismantle the Great Firewall.

description.zh-cn: 通过多种技术手段（如端口封锁、中间人攻击）封锁Google及其服务。
description.en: Blocks Google and its services through various technical means (e.g., port blocking, man-in-the-middle attacks).

description.zh-cn: 封锁了Gmail的网页版及客户端端口。
description.en: Blocked Gmail's web version and client ports.

description.zh-cn: 通过深度包检测和主动探测等方式识别并封锁Tor连接。
description.en: Identifies and blocks Tor connections using methods like deep packet inspection and active probing.

description.zh-cn: 通过主动探测识别并封锁服务器。
description.en: Identifies and blocks servers through active probing.

description.zh-cn: 通过主动探测识别和封锁其依赖的Google App Engine IP。
description.en: Identifies and blocks the Google App Engine IPs it relies on through active probing.

description.zh-cn: 开始对Shadowsocks进行主动探测和封锁。
description.en: Began active probing and blocking of Shadowsocks.

description.zh-cn: 通过IP封锁和DNS污染等方式进行封锁。
description.en: Blocked using methods such as IP blocking and DNS poisoning.

description.zh-cn: 通过IP封锁和DNS污染等方式进行封锁。
description.en: Blocked using methods such as IP blocking and DNS poisoning.

description.zh-cn: 曾对其进行中间人攻击。
description.en: Subjected to a man-in-the-middle attack.

description.zh-cn: 曾对其进行中间人攻击。
description.en: Subjected to a man-in-the-middle attack.

description.zh-cn: 防火长城封锁其翻墙软件，并在2014年的一次故障中将大量域名错误解析至其IP地址。
description.en: The Great Firewall blocks its circumvention software and, in a 2014 malfunction, incorrectly resolved numerous domain names to its IP address.

description.zh-cn: 防火长城（北京）使用了曙光4000L机群。
description.en: The Great Firewall (Beijing) used Sugon 4000L clusters.

description.zh-cn: 防火长城在北京和哈工大的设施使用了Red Hat操作系统。
description.en: The Great Firewall's facilities in Beijing and at Harbin Institute of Technology used the Red Hat operating system.

relationships.source: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 在回应中称GreatFire.org是境外反华组织创办的反华网站。
description.en: In a response, referred to GreatFire.org as an anti-China website founded by an overseas anti-China organization.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部
中华人民共和国外交部
